item.title: Principales Indicadores Económicos de Chile
item.description: Principales Indicadores Económicos USD UF Cobre USD Line Chart > Semana Actual var ctx = document.getElementById('701').getContext('2d'); var options = { type: 'line', data: { labels: ['Lunes 2/8','Martes 3/8', 'Miercoles 4/8', 'Jueves 5/8', 'Viernes 6/8'], datasets: [ { label: 'Week August 9-13', data: [784.5, 787.40], borderColor: 'rgba(255, 99, 132, 0.2)', backgroundColor: 'rgba(255, 99, 132, 1)', }], }, options: { responsive: true, plugins: { legend: { position: 'top', }, title: { display: true, text: 'Valores USD' } } } }; new Chart(ctx, options); USD Line Chart > Semana Anterior var ctx = document.
